title: (x) ...not quite Univers - Univers {Forrest}
content:
Hi all,

I would greatly appreciate any help on this one. The image below is no later than 1971 or 1972. The type looks very much like Univers 65 Bold, yet it is a bit more condensed, but not to the extreme of Univers Condensed. It has a more rounded condensation. (I'm looking at the S and G).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020110151im_/http:/typophile.com/files/underground3.jpg)

Anybody have ideas as to what this can be?
author: dcastillo

comments.content: It's not that condensed, and all of the letters are somewhat rounded, which leads me to believe that it's an overexposed phototype Univers or one of its clones, maybe with some optical condensation / vertical stretching applied.
